wikipedia_page.main: Albert Edwards Benjamin Hall (3 September 1918 – 3 February 1998) was a Welsh footballer who played as a forward in the Football League for Tottenham Hotspur and Plymouth Argyle.

response: Royal Albert Hall is a building in London.

*Albert Hall (engineer) (1878–1941), English engineer and inventor
